description: Start your day with a group stretching session by the calm waters of Aasee, ideal for relaxing muscles and enjoying the outdoor atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful lakeside spot to do light stretching or yoga with your group while watching the serene view of Aasee.
safetyTips: Ensure that everyone has enough space for stretching.
Stay hydrated before and after the session.

description: Capture the beautiful historical architecture and bustling city scenes with your group during a short photo walk through Münster’s iconic Prinzipalmarkt.

locationInfo.description: Take a stroll through the famous Prinzipalmarkt while snapping photos of the historic buildings, fountains, and lively atmosphere.
safetyTips: Be mindful of pedestrians and traffic while walking.
Respect people's privacy when taking photos.
Use a camera strap to prevent accidental drops.

activity: Group Ice Cream Break at Domplatz
description: Take a quick break from exploring with your group and enjoy some delicious ice cream at one of the stands in Domplatz.

locationInfo.description: Sit and enjoy your ice cream at Domplatz, located in front of the impressive Münster Cathedral, perfect for a quick and sweet break.
safetyTips: Watch out for melting ice cream on hot days.
Be considerate of others in public spaces.

activity: Group Water Balloon Fight at Schlossgarten
description: Cool down and have some fun with your group in a water balloon fight at Schlossgarten, perfect for a hot day and a short burst of outdoor fun.

locationInfo.description: A spacious park in Münster, ideal for a water balloon fight, surrounded by lush greenery and castle views.
safetyTips: Ensure everyone is wearing comfortable, light clothing.

description: Enjoy a quick and fun game of frisbee with your group at Aasee Park, perfect for a short, energetic activity outdoors.

locationInfo.description: A spacious park near Aasee, ideal for a quick frisbee game with friends and family, surrounded by green open spaces.
safetyTips: Clear the area before starting to avoid obstacles.
Make sure to warm up your arm before throwing.
Be mindful of other park visitors.
